title: Interpretation of a phone in a dream and a mobile phone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams for mobile, phone for singles, black, white, silver, broken, new, new mobile gift, phone call for married women, loss of mobile for pregnant women Interpretation of a dream about a mobile phone by Ibn Sirin Whoever sees that he is using the phone in a dream to chat or browse and does not know exactly what he is doing, the dream indicates that he is receiving news from someone. And seeing the use of a mobile phone in a dream and knowing the content of the speech or message that came from it, its interpretation is according to the content of the speech or message. Using a phone in a dream may mean that there is someone waiting for you to start communicating with him As for communicating with a specific person without a mobile phone in a dream, this indicates that the relationship can bring them closer in reality, whether on a professional or emotional level. Damage to your mobile device in a dream can indicate the events you are going through in reality Breaking the line in a dream is a break with some close people Interrupting a call in a dream indicates stress and abuse Disconnecting from service or canceling a subscription in a dream can indicate the disintegration or end of a relationship Burning a mobile phone in a dream or exploding a mobile phone is a sign of disturbances or illicit relationships As for breaking a mobile phone in a dream, it can indicate health problems or psychological problems, especially in communication between PeopleIn some cases, a mobile phone can identify a friend, husband, wife, son, or even an enemy. Another interpretation of a dream about a phoneSeeing a phone in a dream indicates a high status and prestigious position, and at the same time indicates the wealth that the dreamer will enjoy. Buying a phone in a dream symbolizes material gains and success in the field of study in particular. As for losing a phone in a dream, it generally carries negative connotations and reflects failure. As for the mobile phone in a dream, it symbolizes the intelligence of the dreamer and his broad culture. Interpretation of a dream about a phone for a single womanSeeing a single woman on the phone in her dream indicates the possibility of her relationship with a man living in another country. As for an unmarried woman who receives a phone call in a dream, she has the opportunity to meet a certain person and then get engaged to him. If she makes a phone call in her dream, this warns her against getting involved in an emotional relationship that may cause her problems. Seeing an unmarried woman on the phone in her dream indicates her relationship with a person who may be outside the country in which she resides. If she receives any call in the dream, this indicates her association with someone. But if she talks to someone and calls him, it will be a bad relationship with a person who must look for About it. What do the interpretations of mobile phone dreams reveal? What are the implications of a telephone dream for a pregnant and married woman? When a married woman breaks the phone in her sleep or throws it on the ground, this warns her of the deterioration of her relationship with her husband and that she will face major financial problems. As for a pregnant woman, buying a phone in a dream is a sign that she is pregnant with a son who will be distinguished in the future by his extreme intelligence and love of knowledge. The phone is one of the most important things in our daily lives

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing chess in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing chess in a dream The interpretation of the dream of seeing chess in a dream is an accurate scientific interpretation. Chess is a game that develops intelligence. It's a game called the Game of Kings. There are many people who love to play chess, and there are also world chess championships, as many people want to teach their children chess as a kind of developing children’s intelligence, but there are also those whose children participate in these international matches, but what is the interpretation of a dream about chess in a dream and is it Is it a good or bad dream? This vision certainly indicates many different connotations and meanings that we recognize according to the leading Arab translators and scholars, as we learn about the interpretation of the vision. The interpretation of the vision is the game of chess and for men, single, married and pregnant, and now we will discover what is the interpretation of the dream about chess.Interpretation Ibn Sirin’s vision of chess: Ibn Sirin, in his interpretation of seeing chess in a dream, considered it undesirable. Chess in a dream indicates disagreements, problems, and confrontations. Interpretation of a dream about chess, this indicates that the one who has the vision has an enemy among those around him. As for the one who sees In his dream that he is playing chess and won, this bodes well and that he will win something soon. Chess in a dream also indicates conflicts and disagreements on the practical side. Interpretation of dreams of a chess board and chess pieces, because the board shows life and the pieces show the ability of insight. Interpretation of a dream about a strong chess piece and its location in The game indicates success and progress in life. Seeing a tower indicates that the person who has the vision has a safe home, and this vision is a sign that the person who has the vision does not leave this house. Or perhaps a trick in the dream shows someone close to him who is loyal to him, and this is a sign of the person who has... A vision to maintain this person and not exaggerate it. For someone who saw a horse or a chess horse in his dream, this indicates that the person with the vision has a good wife. For anyone who saw an elephant in a chess vision, this indicates that the visionary insists on achieving profits in any way. way or by any means. For those who saw the minister in his chess game in a game of chess, this indicates the presence of a close friend of insight. In a dream, the minister may refer to the wife or husband as the closest person. Seeing a king in a chess dream indicates The presence of a person having a vision for himself. If he is trapped and on the verge of death, this indicates that the vision is surrounded by problems and difficulties. If the dreamer is able to break the siege, this indicates that the vision will overcome his problems. Interpretation of the vision of chess for a single woman: The interpretation of a dream about chess in a dream indicates For a single woman, it means something important in her life where a decision must be made, but after good study and a lot of thought to reach the right decision. If an unmarried woman sees a chess game in her dream, it means that she is about to come to an event or matter that she must think about and keep secret. Until the appropriate decision is made. It is good for a single woman to see her playing with the white pieces. Interpretation of a dream about chess for a married woman: Interpretation of

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a person eating cooked meat in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: To see in a dream that I am eating cooked meat is something that many of us see in a dream, as most jurists suggest that it is often good for the uterus to taste delicious, but if it is disgusting then it is a sign of poor materials or health conditions, so follow us quickly. Tour to learn more interpretations about this vision. To see in a dream that I am eating cooked meat. Seeing someone eating cooked meat in a dream is a sign of injuring an enemy or getting rid of an annoying relationship that lasted for a long time that disturbs the person’s life and makes him live in sadness and depression. Whoever eats cooked meat but It tastes bad, so it is a sign of being cheated, mixing with bad people, or having little money. If you eat cooked meat with a relative or friend, this indicates the beginning of a new project or the existence of an interest that unites the visionary with this person. When a person eats large quantities of cooked meat It may mean that he is getting close to a corrupt sultan or obtaining money through theft. Seeing eating cooked meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing eating cooked meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin was not mentioned explicitly, but some jurists suggested that eating meat in general is a sign of goodness or goodness. Survival of disaster. When you receive large amounts of meat, this may indicate an increase in a person’s status or work in the court of the ruling sultan, as well as an increase in money. When a person refuses to eat cooked meat, this is an indication of the values ​​and principles that make him reject forbidden money or cheating. If the dreamer eats camel meat, this is evidence of enduring pain and suffering in order to obtain money through legal means. If a person is seen eating goat meat, it is evidence of dealing with a cunning enemy or great power and influence, and if it is chicken meat, it indicates the appearance of a weak enemy before him. Seeing themselves eating cooked meat in a dream for an unmarried woman: Seeing one person eating cooked meat in a dream indicates a relationship with a wealthy person. When an unmarried girl refuses to eat meat, this may mean her reluctance in the current period from the idea of ​​marriage or her desire to achieve herself and start Practical life. If an unknown man appears in a dream and wants to marry a girl and offers her cooked meat, this is a sign of his attachment to her and his desire to complete this marriage as quickly as possible. If you eat cooked meat and it tastes delicious, this indicates that the girl is engaged to the person who She had been with him for years. Interpretation of a dream about eating lamb meat for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked lamb meat for unmarried women often indicates readiness for marriage or entry into a new stage, whether in terms of study or work. If a girl sees that one of his relatives is offering her pregnancy, then this It indicates that he wants to marry her or that he is constantly thinking about it, and it may also mean that he is in trouble, but he can help her. If the girl refuses to eat cooked lamb, this may indicate that she is going through an emotional void due to her separation from her lover. Seeing herself eating cooked meat Seen in a dream for a married woman

title: Interpretation of seeing my mother-in-law in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We pass through an encyclopedia to discuss the interpretation of seeing my mother-in-law in a dream. Since dreams are a series of fantasies that occur during periods of sleep, the West has differed in defining the term for dreams, as the West sees it as the only means that a person uses to achieve his deep-rooted desires, especially those that are difficult to achieve. In fact. As a popular proverb, the hungry man, who dreams of the market to live, demonstrated the validity of the Western interpretation of dreams. However, most dreams appear in a hidden and incomprehensible state of the dreamer and resemble the thinking of madmen. Many Muslim scholars paid attention to dreams and developed a science about them, while trying to interpret Dreams, their sources, causes, analysis and distribution of their types. Meaning of mother-in-law in a dream There are many interpretations of dreams about mother-in-law in a dream according to the content of the dream itself. Seeing the interpretation of mother-in-law in a dream means that many good and great changes will occur in the dreamer’s life. Likewise, visions indicate an abundance of goodness and happiness for the dreamer and his family. , in addition to indicating their marriage in the near future. It also indicates visions of strength and interconnectedness in the relationship and the flow of affection between the dreamer and his mother-in-law. Seeing a mother-in-law in a single woman’s dream. Scholars differed in the interpretation of seeing an unmarried mother-in-law in a dream. Seeing an unmarried mother-in-law giving her a gift indicates The possibility of her marrying a rich person, while some see this as a sign of taking advantage of an acquaintance. The vision indicates the approaching date of the engagement and marriage of the person whom one loves, desires, and cares for, and she and her family must prepare to welcome him. Some visions of eating with her mother-in-law also indicate that she will receive On what she wants in her personal and professional life. For seeing your mother-in-law crying in a dream, it means that you will have a lot of kindness and a lot of money in the future. In addition to seeing your mother-in-law in a dream about being single, engaged, but there is a disagreement about something, this dream indicates Until something might upset her and plunge her into a state of depression, and it might happen. It is a separation from her fiancé. While the dreams of her mother-in-law kiss an unmarried woman in a dream, the benefits that accrue to the girl from her husband’s mother will increase because of her love for her. Interpretation of a dream about quarreling with the husband’s mother: These dreams may be due to an increasing desire to quarrel with her mother-in-law, but what prevents her is her husband. You don't want to add to his worry. Her mother-in-law. We explain below some interpretations of the visions: Some interpreted dreams of a mother-in-law quarreling with her daughter-in-law in a dream as a sign of the love and noble feelings that the wife has for her. A wife’s quarrel with her mother-in-law also indicates the dominance of negative feelings that the wife hides from her in reality and her constant desire to provoke quarrels. With her. If the wife is in a dispute with her husband and the vision comes as she is quarreling with her mother-in-law, this explains the approaching time for reconciliation between the spouses. Seeing my ex-wife’s mother in a dream. Interpretations of a divorced woman seeing her ex-husband’s mother in a dream differed, depending on whether she was alone or with one of her daughters, or she cried or I greeted the divorced woman and hugged her.

title: Interpretation of the meaning of marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of the meaning of marriage in dreamsInterpretation of the meaning of marriage in a dreamThe dream of marriage is one of the recurring dreams that many people see during their sleep, so they want to know the interpretation of these visions and whether it is self-talk or a real vision. Or they separated, and through the following lines in the encyclopedia, we will learn about the interpretations of the leading scholars of interpretation about the dream of marriage, so follow us. Marriage in a dream with Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the dream of marriage symbolizes peace, stability, and comfort. If he sees in his dream that he married a woman and then died. This dream indicates that the dreamer will join a job that causes him exhaustion. To dream that you attended the wedding of someone close to the dreamer indicates that the dreamer is comfortable with that person. When one sees in a dream that he married a dead girl in reality. This means that God Almighty grants him a wish that he longs for. Seeing a wedding with someone familiar indicates that God will allow the monarch to visit the Holy House of God. Whoever sees in his dream that he married a woman he does not know. His vision proved that his death is near, and that God is higher and knows the promises. The dream of marrying a Jew or a sorcerer symbolizes that the dreamer will commit sins and illegal acts through his work. The dream wedding of Al-Nabulsi. Researcher Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi believes that the dream of marriage is a praiseworthy interpretation that indicates that God Almighty He protects the dreamer and has mercy on him. The dream of marrying a beautiful girl indicates that the dreamer will achieve his goals and have many good things. Interpretation of marriage in a dream for a single woman: Marriage in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes that Almighty God will grant the dreamer comfort, happiness, and goodness. This vision also indicates that The dreamer will achieve her goals, succeed in her work, and enjoy good fortune. An unmarried girl’s dream of her marriage indicates that her marriage is imminent in reality and that her circumstances will change for the better. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is marrying someone whose face she has not seen. This vision indicated that her engagement was imminent, but would not be consummated. Whether the person a single woman married in her dream was unknown. This means that she will succeed if she is a student and she will get a lot of money. This vision also indicates that he will communicate soon and achieve what he desires. One of the interpretations of a dream about a single woman marrying an unknown man is that this vision shows that the dreamer is afraid of the future and what is coming. When she sees An unmarried woman dreams that she is marrying a married man. This means that she will face multiple problems in her life. For an unmarried girl to see in her dream that she is marrying a man she does not love and feels comfortable with, this means that she will overcome the difficulties that she will face in her next life. But if the dreamer feels fear in the dream. This dream expresses that he will have to do something.Forcing an unmarried girl to get married in a dream means that she is denying something in reality or that she will postpone some things that she is planning.Whoever sees in her dream that her wedding date is set. Her vision indicates the approaching date of her engagement or marriage. This vision may indicate that the dreamer fulfills his dreams and hears news.

title: I dreamed of my ex-boyfriend, what does the dream mean?

preview.html: I dreamed of my ex-boyfriend. Seeing my ex-lover in a dream expresses the feelings of longing and love that the dreamer has for him, so learn with us the most important interpretations of this dream for single, divorced, married, and pregnant women, according to Ibn Sirin and senior religious scholars. Interpretation. I dreamed of my ex-boyfriend, Ibn Sirin. I dreamed of my ex-boyfriend. Seeing an ex-girlfriend in the hospital in a dream indicates that the dreamer has overcome his feelings for her and is ready to love again and start a new relationship. If the dreamer sees that his ex-girlfriend gave him a teddy bear or a nice gift, this means that he does not He feels secure in his new relationship and is afraid that the same unfortunate events that happened in the previous relationship will be repeated in this one. Seeing a former lover asking a fortuneteller for marriage shows the strength of his will and that he is able to overcome his feelings of longing for her and start a new page, and he must do this so that he does not live in the past and lose sight of him. His present and future. If the dreamer sees that she is walking on an unfamiliar path with Her ex-lover or driving a car with him, this means that she is dissatisfied with her relationship with her current partner and wants this relationship to be like her previous relationship. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. I dreamed of my former friend Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the vision is unpleasant, as it portends evil to the dreamer and indicates that miserable things will happen in his life and that he will face some difficulties in his life. The coming period. If the dreamer sees his ex-girlfriend talking to him in a dream and intends to return to him, this indicates family problems and that there are some disputes between the dreamer’s family members and he must be patient and calm and deal with them. With kindness and gentleness until these disputes end. Seeing the ex-lover sitting in the dreamer’s house and looking at him sadly is a reflection of his longing for her and his desire to return to her to the point that his thoughts turn into dreams, but if he is engaged or connected to another girl, this indicates that he does not love his current partner and wants Breaking up with her. As for seeing the ex-girlfriend smiling, it indicates a feeling of loneliness and emotional emptiness after breaking up with her. If the dreamer feels happy and comfortable when he sees his ex-girlfriend in a dream, this means that the coming days of his life will be happy and he will enjoy the comfort and prosperity that he has missed for a long time. title: Interpretation of seeing work in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing theater in a dream? Good news for the future. What does it mean to see applause after performing work? It is a sign of successes that you will find in all areas of your life. Do you see a lot of students in the school theater? An indication of the daily transactions in which the viewer is involved. Interpretation of seeing theater in The dream? Indicates the stability of the dreamer’s circumstances. Do I see you sitting on theater chairs? Indicates the dreamer’s failure in certain aspects of his life. What does it mean to see a musical play? It talks about the misfortunes that the viewer may be exposed to. What is the interpretation of seeing religious songs? Indicative of goodness Blessing in dieting. Interpretation of seeing work in a dream. This dream foretells for a pregnant woman that her due date is approaching and that her condition will not suffer from major problems. The play is also seen in a married woman’s dream as good news of the coming of abundant goodness and abundant livelihood soon. It indicates the fulfillment of the many ambitions and aspirations that the dreamer seeks to achieve during The previous period tells the dreamer what he will enjoy in the coming period of calm and stability in various aspects of his life. The fact that the girl behaves in this vision and the viewers praise her is evidence of good manners in dealing with her in various life situations. It also indicates the viewer’s distinguished personality that makes him the focus of attention. Those around him. It indicates an abundance of goodness, the blessing of money, and children. Interpretation of seeing a toy in a dream for a single woman. The vision tells her about the incompatibility in her emotional life that may arise from disagreements in the coming period. Likewise, seeing work in a dream expresses what is going on in her mind, indicating her intense desire to find a partner. Life. Seeing himself playing a representative role in the events he saw in the dream is evidence of the great happiness he is experiencing at the present time. This vision also indicates the stability that an unmarried woman enjoys in her love life and her happiness with her life partner. Some commentators have argued that this dream is an indication That there is someone who is hostile to her and pretends otherwise. Seeing applause after performing the play is a sign of the successes she has achieved in the various fields of her professional life. An indication of the prestigious position that the visionary enjoys in her society, being the focus of attention of those around him. The school theater in a dream for single women has that vision without It is linked to several cases, including the one that says that the fortuneteller has many qualities and distinctive characteristics. It also indicates that she will soon change her life for the better or move to a new stage in her career. Some translators interpreted this as a harbinger of what will happen to the fortuneteller, so that it clearly affects financial crises. Seeing the play in The dream is followed by applause from the audience, which indicates the stability of her life at this time. Like watching it for many students in the school theater refers to the daily transactions in which the viewer is involved. Seeing the audience’s dissatisfaction and criticism in action is an indication of what is expected to happen from failure in many things. Theater chairs in a dream. Seeing a theater in a dream, with many people watching a theatrical performance, indicates the stability of the stage.

title: Interpretation of Umrah in a dream.. Interpretation of the symbol of Umrah in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi.

preview.html: The interpretation of Umrah in a dream is certainly a sign of goodness and happiness that the dreamer will experience, as it is one of the religious rituals whose benefits are not limited to obtaining reward and reward from God Almighty, while instilling it in the soul. Feeling comfortable, safe and calm. Interpretation of the symbol of Umrah in a dream. It is one of the most common visions in the world of dreams. Some dream of traveling to Umrah, while others dream of performing its rituals, such as circumambulating the Kaaba. It and its value are in the forgiveness of sins and the forgiveness of sins, and thus this vision expresses the appearance of something worthy of praise for the dreamer or dreamer, which may be on the personal, professional, or financial level, and some may believe that this dream expresses the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desire to go to Umrah soon, but the vision carries There are many other praiseworthy connotations that you can see in the following lines of the encyclopedia. Interpretation of Umrah in a dream Our respected scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing Umrah in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate goodness and great happiness. The fortuneteller also predicted that he will live a long life, God willing. In some cases, it is a sign that the dreamer will repent for the sins and disobedience that he commits in his life and walk on the path of truth, God willing. In the event that the dreamer becomes ill or suffers from some harm, then his vision is a sign of his recovery. From diseases and his speedy recovery by our Lord Almighty. In most cases, seeing Umrah in a dream warns the dreamer that he will get rid of all the worries and sorrows that have accumulated on him, and God Almighty will comfort him. Interpretation of the symbol of Umrah in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin indicated that if the dreamer sees in a dream That he will go to Umrah, this expresses abundant goodness and livelihood, in addition to the blessing of life. The vision of going to Umrah also reflects the dreamer’s good condition and his closeness to God. In the event that the dreamer is not already married, the vision of Umrah represents his marriage to a girl with noble morals. It reflects This vision is the dreamer’s sincere intention to repent to God and get rid of the sins and transgressions he has committed in reality. Seeing Umrah in a dream indicates the coming of rest and comfort for the dreamer and the nearness of his judgment in reality, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself returning from Umrah, this is an indication that the dreamer will be able to achieve What he wants in reality. If the dreamer is already suffering from a financial crisis, then this dream is good news for getting rid of this crisis, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing Umrah in a dream according to Nabulsi. As for what the dream interpreter Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi said about this vision, he agreed with Ibn Sirin that the symbol of this The vision lies in goodness, abundance of sustenance, and a long life for the dreamer, and God knows best. If one sees going to Umrah in a dream, this means that the dreamer will get rid of his fears and feel reassured. Seeing a student performing Umrah in a dream is only a sign of the dreamer’s ambition and his desire to obtain all kinds of knowledge. As for seeing this dream for a person who is in distress Financially, this is good news that his fears will go away and his condition will change for the better. If the dreamer sees that

title: I dreamed that I was riding a motorcycle

preview.html: I dreamed that I was riding a motorcycle in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. The motorcycle is a light means of transportation and is characterized by ease and speed of moving from one place to another, especially in crowded places, and today through we will present to you this article. I dreamed that I was riding a motorcycle, according to great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I was riding a motorcycle in a dream. Dreaming of driving and riding a motorcycle professionally indicates that the dreamer will receive reward for his pursuit in life and will achieve many successes. Riding a bike Motorcycles and difficulty walking in a dream: It is mentioned that the viewer is going through a difficult period full of crises and problems. Seeing a motorcycle driving and riding at a high speed in a dream indicates that the viewer is a reckless person who makes all his decisions without thinking about them. Riding a motorcycle and an accident in a dream indicates that the monarch has failed in something. He was working hard for it for a long time. I dreamed that I was riding a motorcycle in a dream for a single woman. Seeing in a dream a single woman riding a motorcycle says that she is a strong girl and has the ability to make all the right decisions in her life. Riding a motorcycle on a safe road in a person’s dream announces her closeness to God and her distance About everything that displeases God. Buying a motorcycle in a person’s dream announces that he will soon marry someone with good morals. Seeing only white motorcycles in a dream announces many happy events and news in her life. Motorcycles in a person’s sleep in general. It indicates the great success and distinction that she will achieve. In your academic and professional life. I dreamed that I was riding a motorcycle in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman riding a motorcycle at a reasonable speed in a dream indicates her ability to treat those around her wisely and well. A red motorcycle in a married woman’s dream indicates the relationship of love, tenderness, and compassion between her and her husband. Stealing a motorcycle in a married woman’s dream indicates that many crises will occur between her and her husband during this period. Seeing a married woman’s motorcycle on an obstacle course in a dream indicates her inability to take responsibility for her home and children. I dreamed that I was riding a motorcycle in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a woman A pregnant woman riding a fast motorcycle in a dream shows that she will undergo an easy and affordable birth. The motorcycle in a pregnant woman’s dream announces that she will give birth to a female, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was riding a motorcycle in a dream about a man. Seeing a man in a dream riding a motorcycle with someone he knows indicates that he will achieve through His work has many successes and profits. A new motorcycle in a man’s dream indicates that there will be a mutually beneficial relationship between the dreamer and someone close to him. Buying a motorcycle in a bachelor’s dream indicates that he will marry a good and suitable girl for him. Dreaming of a man’s motorcycle making a loud noise shows that he is a person He is reckless and loses his temper a lot. We are happy that the site is witnessing...

title: Do you know the interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s imprisonment?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about prison: There is no doubt that seeing prison raises a kind of anxiety and doubt in the soul, because imprisonment suggests crime and punishment, wandering and helplessness, imprisonment and obstruction. The vision is considered repulsive and in this article we take a look at all the signs and situations in more detail and explanation. Interpretation of a dream about prison: The vision of prison expresses the internal restrictions, psychological and nervous pressures, and fears that surround the person, and everything that hinders his journey and movement, and prevents him from his desires, and the logic of achieving goals and objectives. , and restrictions on achieving the goal. Goal. And confusion and distraction of the mind. If one looks at the jailer, this indicates the prevailing anxiety, the distress of suffocation, the prolonged distress and sadness, the succession of sentences, the punishment that falls on a person, and the anguish of the heart in some events. If the dreamer sees himself entering the prison without coercion, this indicates his desire In isolating himself from social life and cutting the ties that connect him with others, or tending towards isolation, worship, and asceticism in this world. Interpretation of a dream about prison by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that prison is interpreted in more than one way. It interprets evil people, harm, severe illness, imprisonment from work, getting out of bed, and falling. In conspiracies and the grave, the jailer is therefore interpreted as the grave. Prison also symbolizes the world and its conditions, growing up in it, pursuing desires, and following temptations. Whoever sees that he is imprisoned and oppressed, this indicates innocence, the emergence of the truth, a change in circumstances for the better, and the restoration of prestige, prestige, and sovereignty. The Prophet of God, Joseph, gives this interpretation in his story (peace be upon him). What does imprisonment mean in a single woman’s dream? Ibn Shaheen believes that the interpretation of a dream about imprisonment for an unmarried woman indicates marriage to a man famous for his qualities and morals, respected in his knowledge and position, and moving to a new place, benefiting from previous experiences and the ability to do so. He fights himself for his hidden desires. On the other hand, some jurists see that imprisoning unmarried people is evidence of delaying their marriage, reconsidering this issue, knowing its causes, and finding useful solutions to resolve the outstanding issues and overcome obstacles to achieve the desired. If you see that he entered prison voluntarily, this indicates anxiety and stability. , and prevented himself from fun and games, leaving her with everything that distracted her, and the precision and planning of what she was determined to achieve and the achievement of many planned goals. Interpretation of dreams of my brother going to prison for an unmarried woman. If the sister sees her brother in prison, and he is innocent and righteous, this indicates Being alone with his Lord, insisting on worship, and abandoning what he was doing. If he is corrupt, this indicates the misfortunes that befall him, and the punishments he receives as a punishment for his actions and words. If he enters prison in front of people, this is interpreted as breaking the group and deviating from the rules. On the other hand, it expresses This vision is about the restrictions that prevent the brother from his travels and dreams and hinder his steps from achieving his goals and hopes, and he stumbles when he walks and his inability to overcome the obstacles that he faces on his way. What does prison mean in a dream about
